attributes.action: Remove Pakistan From The Red List [Travel]
attributes.additional_details:
When a country’s COVID rate is between 20-25 the government considers it for the red list . When Pakistan was put in,the rate was 20 +, so it was acceptable for the UK government to take such action . However , currently Pakistan’s rate has dipped to approximately 11.
 Citizens who travel due to emergency reasons could be left with debts which could result in lots of stress . Stress can then cause devastating effects such as mental breakdowns . 

 We hope the [GOV] takes equitable action ASAP
attributes.background:
Evidence shows that Pakistan’s COVID-19 rate has decreased drastically and that the curve has been flattened . 
I, along with all British/Overseas Pakistani’s request the UK government to remove Pakistan from the red list .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
